name: part_009
file: tmp_【#ノエルのリリカルLIVE 】新たな団長を見てッ !【白銀ノエル⧸ホロライブ】 [8DQWjvFBma4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: MC section where Noel and her guests (Marine, Lamy, and Korone) create and perform a 'three-slot' pose based on audience suggestions.
Performance of the song 'Sirius' by Shirogane Noel.

subtitles.original: （笑い声）
subtitles.english: (Laughter)

subtitles.original: 何このポーズ！
subtitles.english: What is this pose?!

subtitles.original: もうジョジョやん、こんなん！
subtitles.english: This is totally like JoJo!

subtitles.original: あ、リンボーダンスかな？
subtitles.english: Oh, is it a limbo dance?

subtitles.original: リンボーダンス…
subtitles.english: Limbo dance...

subtitles.original: いや、ちょっと何も取れないよ、この距離じゃ！
subtitles.english: Wait, I can't catch anything from this distance!

subtitles.original: ころねんの、て、手、リンボーダンス…
subtitles.english: Korone's hand-limbo dance...

subtitles.original: （笑い声）
subtitles.english: (Laughter)

subtitles.original: すごいね、何でもできるんだね、すごい！
subtitles.english: Amazing, you can do anything! Wow!

subtitles.original: 何でもできる装備になったんだ、今日ね！
subtitles.english: I've got the equipment to do anything today!

subtitles.original: やっぱね、動きやすい衣装をお願いしてて…
subtitles.english: Yeah, I asked for an outfit that's easy to move in...

subtitles.original: せっかく動きやすい衣装になったから、何かポーズ取ってもらうか、何かね？
subtitles.english: Since you've got this easy-to-move outfit, why not strike some poses?

subtitles.original: 確かにね、やかまし恒例のスリーロットポーズもやりますか！
subtitles.english: True, shall we do the usual Yakamashi 'three-slot' pose?

subtitles.original: やりましょう！やりましょう！
subtitles.english: Let's do it! Let's do it!

subtitles.original: じゃあちょっと待ってね、みんなが見えてほしいから…
subtitles.english: Wait a sec, I want everyone to be visible, so...

subtitles.original: やかま…えーと、ま、こんな感じで！
subtitles.english: Yakamashi... well, something like this!

subtitles.original: じゃあ、頭スロットはじゃあ、ラミィ行こうかな？
subtitles.english: Okay, for the head slot, shall we go with Lamy?

subtitles.original: 頭ラミィ！うん、頭ラミィで行こうか！
subtitles.english: Lamy for the head! Yeah, let's go with head-Lamy!

subtitles.original: で、上半身は？
subtitles.english: And the upper body?

subtitles.original: 上半身じゃあ、マ、マリン！船長が担当します！
subtitles.english: For the upper body, Ma-Marine! The Captain will take charge!

subtitles.original: じゃあころね下半身で！シリュリュリュリュ…
subtitles.english: Then Korone for the lower body! *drumroll sounds*

subtitles.original: えー、まず顔はやっぱり髪型を見せたいから、こう！
subtitles.english: First, for the face, I want to show off the hair, so like this!

subtitles.original: ちょっと横向いてもらって、あ、そっちだね。で、ウィンクとかにしようかな？
subtitles.english: Turn to the side a bit... ah, that way. And how about a wink?

subtitles.original: あ、なるほどウィンク！あ、そう。で、ちょっと首かしげてほしいな！
subtitles.english: Ah, I see, a wink! Right. And I'd like a slight head tilt!

subtitles.original: あー、いいいいいい！いいよ、なるほどね、オッケー！
subtitles.english: Ah, nice, nice, nice! That's good. I see, okay!

subtitles.original: じゃあ、上半身はね、ちょっと屈み気味にして…
subtitles.english: Now, for the upper body, lean forward a bit...

subtitles.original: お、お、お、どうだ？お胸が重そうで大変だから、手で持ち上げて！
subtitles.english: Oh, oh, oh, how's that? It looks heavy on the chest, so hold them up with your hands!

subtitles.original: （笑い声）いいよいいよいいよ！はい、なるほどね！
subtitles.english: (Laughter) Nice, nice, nice! Okay, I see!

subtitles.original: 下半身はね、じゃあ、できる限り開いてもらって…
subtitles.english: As for the lower body, well, spread them as wide as you can...

subtitles.original: 怪しくなってきたぞ！結構開く！結構開く！
subtitles.english: This is getting suspicious! That's quite wide! Quite wide!

subtitles.original: で、ちょっと内股みたいな。難しいな、何だこのポーズ、プルプルするぞ！
subtitles.english: And then, sort of pigeon-toed. This is tough! What is this pose? I'm shaking!

subtitles.original: あ、膝ついてもらおうかな、そしたら！膝つきね、そのまま…
subtitles.english: Ah, how about kneeling then! On your knees, just like that...

subtitles.original: あ、いいじゃん！あー！首！首！もっと屈んで！もっと！
subtitles.english: Oh, that's great! Ah! Your head! Your head! Lean down more! More!

subtitles.original: とんでもないよ、このポーズ！いいじゃん！ウィンク！ウィンク！
subtitles.english: This pose is outrageous! It's good! Wink! Wink!

subtitles.original: 一人だけおかしいって、ポーズ！全然ウィンクじゃない！
subtitles.english: One of these poses is just wrong! That's not a wink at all!

subtitles.original: これでも正解スロットだよ、これ！いいと思うよ！やかましで見てみるか！
subtitles.english: But this is the 'correct' slot! I think it's great! Let's check it with Yakamashi!

subtitles.original: 一人だけ座ってるじゃん！ありがとう！このポーズ大事にしていくわ！
subtitles.english: One of them is just sitting! Thank you! I'll cherish this pose!

subtitles.original: じゃあこの後もいっぱい歌って踊るから、三人は特等席で見ててくだせえよ！
subtitles.english: Well, I'll be singing and dancing plenty more, so you three, watch from the best seats!

subtitles.original: 最前で見てますよ！お目に焼き付けるわ！頑張って！
subtitles.english: We'll watch from the front row! We'll burn it into our eyes! Good luck!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！バイバーイ！応援してるよ！頑張れ！
subtitles.english: Thank you! Bye-bye! We're rooting for you! Go for it!

subtitles.original: シリウス
subtitles.english: Sirius

subtitles.original: 誰かが勝手に決めた 既製品(レディーメイド)な
subtitles.english: A ready-made one decided by someone else

subtitles.original: 今日を賑わせて 裸足で走ってゆく
subtitles.english: Enlivening today, I'll run barefoot

subtitles.original: 間違ったって 転んだって
subtitles.english: Even if I make mistakes, even if I fall

subtitles.original: 振り向いた痛みも オリジナルな明日になる
subtitles.english: The pain I look back on will become an original tomorrow

subtitles.original: 突き上げたこの手に 握り締めた
subtitles.english: In this hand I thrust upward, I grasped tight

subtitles.original: 誓いが 光になって
subtitles.english: The oath became a light
